name: Markdown Note
description: Convert voice input into structured Markdown notes with title, bullets, and action items. Works offline, no API key needed. Say 'Take note [your content]'.
instructions:
No setup required! This plugin works locally without any API.

Usage:
1. Say 'Take note' followed by your content
2. The plugin will format it as a structured Markdown note
3. The note includes a title, bullet points, and action items

Example: 'Take note meeting with Sarah discussed Q2 budget need to follow up with finance'

Action item keywords: need to, have to, should, remember to, follow up, make sure
